title: [CRASH]
body:
**Crash report**

```
2020-08-04 12:11:36.236 [redisMessageListenerContainer-1] ERROR o.s.d.r.l.RedisMessageListenerContainer - Connection failure occurred. Restarting subscription task after 5000 ms

```

**Aditional information**

1. OS: Debain 10
2. I created a cluster using HAaProxy --> Redis Cluster <-- Redis sentinal.

The Application will be crash when have a lot of Restarting subscription task after 5000 ms.

comments_data.body: closing, not relevant for this repo (or missing info)
